instruction: Design a marketing strategy in less than 100 words for the given product.
input: Product: A new low-cost multipurpose printer.
output: Our marketing strategy for the new low-cost multipurpose printer is focused on emphasizing the cost-saving benefits as compared to traditional printers. We will offer competitive pricing and promotions and partner with other businesses to increase brand awareness. We will use social media platforms to spread the word about our product, as well as developing a digital marketing strategy to reach potential customers across the world. Additionally, we will use direct mail and email campaigns, as well as offering discounts to existing customers.
